name: Crimson Wings 2: Sky Warriors
description:
Controls:

Up/Down/Left/Right Keys---> Movements

X--->Shoot Straight

Z--->Shoot Upper Left

C--->Shoot Upper

V--->Missile

Space Bar---> Bomb

Shift/CTRL---> Switch Aircraft

1---> To Go Back to Title

Note:

In Stage 4 You can skip this
Mission By Pressing S Key during

game play.

Features:

.unlockable hidden stages

.unlockable secret weapon

.unlockable new aircrafts

.Hidden Secret Bosses
